title: Ultimate Over-Engineered Tabs
prompt:
Build the ultimate over-engineered tabs/panels dashboard in React (single HTML file with Babel standalone or a small bundled app).

LAYOUT:
- Tabs positioned around ALL sides of the screen (top, bottom, left, right)
- Each side can have multiple icon tabs
- Clicking a tab opens a sidebar/panel that slides in from that direction
- Multiple panels can be open simultaneously
- Panels can be resized by dragging edges
- Panels can be pinned/unpinned (pinned stays open, unpinned closes when clicking away)

TAB DESIGN:
- Glass morphism effect (frosted glass, blur, transparency)
- Beautiful icons (use a library like Lucide, Heroicons, or inline SVGs)
- Subtle glow/highlight on hover
- Smooth color transitions
- Active tab indicator (glow, underline, or scale effect)
- Tab groups with visual separators

PANEL DESIGN:
- Glass morphism matching the tabs
- Smooth slide-in animations (spring physics if possible)
- Header with title, pin button, close button
- Content area with subtle scroll styling
- Shadow/depth effect to show layering
- Backdrop blur effect on the main content behind

INTERACTIONS:
- Keyboard shortcuts (1-9 for quick tab access, Escape to close all)
- Drag tabs to reorder them
- Double-click tab to maximize that panel
- Right-click context menu on tabs (close, close others, settings)
- Smooth 60fps animations throughout

THEME:
- Dark mode with vibrant accent colors
- Gradient backgrounds on panels
- Consistent border radius and spacing
- Make it look like a premium productivity app

CONTENT:
- Populate panels with placeholder content (settings panel, file browser, terminal, chat, notifications, etc.)
- At least 3-4 tabs per side (12+ total tabs)
- Show off the system with realistic-looking fake content

Make it absurdly polished - the kind of UI that makes developers say "okay that's too nice".
note: Over-engineered glass morphism tabs from all directions - React app
